r.d: This is a Renderer driver for Structures_DataGrid using PEAR::Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer.
r.n:
Changes since Structures_DataGrid 0.6.3:
- Renderer driver unbundled from Structures_DataGrid core - request #5806 and request #5808: added support for custom Excel Writer and Format objects (thanks Vincent Vermersch for these requests) - bug #7534: version and encoding need to be set for the workbook / worksheet
